List of parishes in the Diocese of Salfo: The parish of St James the Less is located in the town of Rawtenstall, within the Rossendale borough, and operates under the UTCÂ±00:00 timezone. Founded in 1828, the parish priest is Fr David Lupton, who also serves as Rural Dean. This parish currently remains open.

The parish of St Joseph was located in the village of Stacksteads, Lancashire, United Kingdom. It was founded in 1947 and closed in 2005. There is no information available on the parish priest during its operation.
